entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Tatlayoko Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Wind light except southwest 30 km/h over southern sections late in the morning and in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
